localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Back-to-back video calls stressing you out? Give yourself (and everyone else attending your next meeting) a chance to pause by adding a 2min guided audio meditation before entering the call. Works with whatever video software you use.
blogPost.body: Back-to-back video calls stressing you out? Give yourself (and everyone else attending your next meeting) a chance to pause by adding a 2min guided audio meditation before entering the call. Works with whatever video software you use.
blogPost.title: Mindful Meetings - Add a 2min guided meditation to any video link
blogPost.author: Calvin Benton

localize.description: 连续的视频电话让你压力山大？在进入通话前加入2分钟的引导式音频冥想，给自己（以及参加下次会议的所有人）一个暂停的机会。无论您使用什么视频软件，都可以使用。
localize.tagline: 在任何视频链接中添加一个2分钟的冥想引导。

localize.description: 連續的視頻電話讓你壓力山大？在進入通話前加入2分鐘的引導式音頻冥想，給自己（以及參加下次會議的所有人）一個暫停的機會。無論您使用什麼視頻軟件，都可以使用。
localize.tagline: 在任何視頻鏈接中添加一個2分鐘的冥想引導。

previous.excerpt: cvlogin.com is your free online CV generator that helps you to create a professional resume within minutes. Global job seekers benefit with ready to download CV templates in 12 languages such as Arabic, English, French, German, Hindi or Spanish. Try it now!🚀
previous.title: cvlogin - Create your professional resume in 12 languages

localize.description: cvlogin.com是你的免费在线简历生成器，帮助你在几分钟内创建一个专业的简历。全球的求职者都能受益于12种语言（如阿拉伯语、英语、法语、德语、印地语或西班牙语）的随时下载的简历模板。现在就试试吧！🚀。
localize.tagline: 用12种语言创建您的专业简历

localize.description: cvlogin.com是你的免費在線簡歷生成器，幫助你在幾分鐘內創建一個專業的簡歷。全球的求職者都能受益於12種語言（如阿拉伯語、英語、法語、德語、印地語或西班牙語）的隨時下載的簡歷模板。現在就試試吧！🚀。
localize.tagline: 用12種語言創建您的專業簡歷

next.excerpt: After more than 150,000 happy customers on the Mac App Store, MeetInOne - the all-in-one Google Meet desktop app - is finally coming to the Windows Store. Get the app now & enjoy a 50% discount on our one-time pricing. The discount is valid until next Sunday.
next.title: MeetInOne - The all-in-one Google Meet desktop app for Windows

localize.description: 在Mac App Store上拥有超过15万名满意的用户之后，MeetInOne--这个集所有功能于一身的Google Meet桌面应用--终于来到了Windows Store。现在就获取该应用，并享受一次性价格的50%折扣。折扣有效期至下周日。
localize.tagline: 适用于Windows的全能型Google Meet桌面应用。

localize.description: 在Mac App Store上擁有超過15萬名滿意的用戶之後，MeetInOne--這個集所有功能於一身的Google Meet桌面應用--終於來到了Windows Store。現在就獲取該應用，並享受一次性價格的50%折扣。折扣有效期至下週日。
localize.tagline: 適用於Windows的全能型Google Meet桌面應用。
